1383.description: CSS pseudo-class NotSupportedException - merged by dsyme 2026-02-22

1437.description: xs:dateTime without timezone parses correctly as DateTimeOffset

1419.description: XSD group ref cycle guard - StackOverflow fix endorsed by dsyme

1439.description: InferRows counts CSV rows not text lines - endorsed by dsyme

2026-02-22.skipped: Microsoft.Build 17.11.4 (has known CVEs GHSA-w3q9-fxm7-j8fq, GHSA-h4j7-5rxr-p4wc) - needs compatibility check with FAKE

7.0.0.description: Updated 7.0.0 Unreleased section with bug fixes: #1508, #1453, #1230, #1356, #1509/#1223, #946

maintainer_instructions: Issue #1509 submitter says the fix in PR #1510 does NOT resolve the issue (from dsyme comment 2026-02-21)
dsyme endorsed fixing issue #1310 (EmbeddedResource + Schema/GetSchema bug) on 2026-02-22
dsyme endorsed StrictBooleans parameter for CsvProvider in issue #1417 (2024-03-11)
dsyme endorsed implementing cycle guard for XSD group refs in issue #1419 (2026-02-22)
dsyme endorsed fixing InferRows multiline CSV bug in issue #1439 (2026-02-22)

notes.issue_1509: Closed by dsyme on 2026-02-22 (PR #1605 merged fixed it)
notes.issue_1330: HTML whitespace-stripping bug - complex to fix, needs context-aware inline/block detection
notes.issue_1310: FIXED in PR #1619 - GetSchema now reads from embedded resource at runtime when EmbeddedResource is specified. Assembly.Load fix applied 2026-02-22T19:47. CI pending.
notes.issue_1439: FIXED in PR #1625 branch repo-assist/fix-issue-1439-inferrows-multiline-csv-9645f782b479e0ac. Pass None as maxNumberOfRows so raw text is never truncated by line count.
notes.issue_1417: IMPLEMENTED in PR #1621. StrictBooleans=true: 0/1->int, yes/no->string, true/false->bool. TypeProviderInstantiation.fs already updated. PR #1622 is redundant (Copilot SWE sub-PR).
notes.issue_1419: FIXED in PR #1626. Added VisitingGroups HashSet to ParsingContext, cycle detected in parseParticle for GroupRef case. Test with recursive content model schema passes. Branch: repo-assist/fix-issue-1419-xsd-cycle-guard
notes.issue_1436: Trimmability for Blazor WASM. Commented 2026-02-22 explaining DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation requirement and path forward.
notes.issue_1340: Commented 2026-02-22: F# 6.0+ includes fix for #r nuget design-time resolution; Load uses runtime cwd by design; use Path.Combine(__SOURCE_DIRECTORY__, ...) for runtime paths.
notes.issue_1283: Commented 2026-02-22: TP static params must be compile-time constants. Workarounds: (1) use const schema, load data at runtime from config; (2) multiple providers + runtime if/else; (3) XDocument for fully dynamic.
notes.issue_1302: Commented 2026-02-22: TP composability not natively supported. Suggested manual fallback pattern.
notes.issue_1303: Commented 2026-02-22: Enhancement request, not currently supported. Related to #1432. Workaround: use JsonValue.[] accessor.
notes.issue_1431: Commented 2026-02-22 (run 2): CsvProvider row update workarounds explained. Row.With() copy method would need TP changes in CsvProvider.fs.
notes.issue_1366: Commented 2026-02-22: PR #1365 (merged April 2021) fixed the web URI cache expiry bug. Suggested closing.
notes.issue_1241: Commented 2026-02-22 (run 2): JsonProvider lenient by design - missing fields return zero values. Suggested Option<T> or JsonValue alternatives.
notes.issue_1336: Commented 2026-02-22 (run 3): Design-time resolution root cause for FS0039 Row error. __SOURCE_DIRECTORY__ workaround. Labelled: documentation, question.
notes.issue_1325: Commented 2026-02-22 (run 3): AppendQueryToUrl still internal. Provided UriBuilder workaround. Labelled: enhancement, good first issue.
notes.microsoft_build_vulns: Microsoft.Build 17.11.4 has CVEs GHSA-w3q9-fxm7-j8fq and GHSA-h4j7-5rxr-p4wc. PR #1618 merged by dsyme (from separate Copilot workflow).
notes.pr_1618_merged: PR #1618 (Microsoft.Build security update) merged by dsyme on main branch.
notes.release_status: Last GitHub release 6.3.0 (Sep 2023). RELEASE_NOTES.md has 6.4.0-6.6.0 and 7.0.0 Unreleased. Release prep PR #1616 created 2026-02-22 for 7.0.0.
notes.pr_1619_status: PR #1619 has Assembly.Load fix (commit f9687ff). CI pending for latest commit.
notes.pr_1620_note: PR #1620 merged by dsyme into PR #1619 branch on 2026-02-22T19:33. Added test for GetSchema with EmbeddedResource.
notes.pr_1621_review: TypeProviderInstantiation.fs was already updated in PR #1621 (StrictBooleans added). Replied to dsyme review. Copilot sub-PR #1622 is redundant.
notes.pr_1622_note: PR #1622 is a WIP sub-PR from Copilot SWE agent targeting PR #1621 branch. REDUNDANT - TypeProviderInstantiation.fs was already updated in PR #1621.
notes.pr_1623_note: PR #1623 (Assembly.Load fix) is SUPERSEDED - fix was pushed directly to PR #1619 branch on 2026-02-22T19:47.
notes.pr_1626_note: PR #1626 (XSD cycle guard) created 2026-02-22 (run 3). Adds VisitingGroups tracking to parseParticle.
notes.issue_1624: Workflow failure issue #1624 created by github-actions bot. Reports 'Code Push Failed: create_pull_request: Failed to apply patch' on branch repo-assist/deps-update-2026-02-22. This was a previous failed run - PR #1614 already exists so the failure was a duplicate attempt.
notes.xsd_cycle_guard_fix: Fix in PR #1626: added VisitingGroups HashSet<XmlQualifiedName> to ParsingContext, guard in parseParticle for GroupRef case. Test added in InferenceTests.fs with recursive group schema.
